item.title: Minesweeper. Another Love Story
item.description: Originally published on Medium Her face was bathed in white light as she leaned closer to the monitor. “If this is a 1, then one of these two must be a mine…” she thought aloud, her fingers touching the screen. “And if you look at that tile…” he gently prodded. “This must be the mine!” she shrieked, her face now glowing brighter than the monitor. She was playing minesweeper. And she was loving it.
